edu.uci.isr.impromptu.common
Interface Peer

All Known Implementing Classes:
RepositoryPeer, SlicePeer
public interface Peer

An abstract peer. It can be a repostiory peer, a pie peer, or other type.

Author:
Jie Ren

fileAdded

public boolean fileAdded(java.lang.String fileName,
                         double radius,
                         double angle)
The peer has added a file.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the newly added file
radius - the relative radius (between 0 and 1) of the newly added file. This might be null if another application creates the file
angle - the relative angle (between 0 and 1) of the newly added file. This might be null if another application creates the file
Returns:
true if there was not such a file, false otherwise

fileMoved

public boolean fileMoved(java.lang.String fileName,
                         double radius,
                         double angle)
The peer has moved a file

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the newly moved file
radius - the new relative radius (between 0 and 1) of the newly added file
angle - the new relative angle (between 0 and 1) of the newly added file
Returns:
true if there was not such a file, false otherwise

fileRemoved

public boolean fileRemoved(java.lang.String fileName)
The peer has removed a file

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the newly removed file
Returns:
true if there was a file, false otherwise

owns

public boolean owns(java.lang.String fileName)
Whether the peer owns a file

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file
Returns:
true if the peer owns it, false if it does not own it
